TopicTitle: game shuts down 1 second after docking with dual docking port

Articles.Content:
hello ,

 

i made a big ship that needs orbital docking , after making the parts putting them in orbit it was time for docking .

only after the docking the game shuts down ,the game runs smooth no stutters no freezes , oke frames , but every single time after docking this specific parts the game shuts down .

the parts i am docking have a dual docking port system i was told on the discord this could be an issue and i could make a save game right before the docking and post this here so to give you guys a chance to check this out .

so i made a safe file i am just not sure how to share it here can anyone help me ? 

 

thanks in advance
love the new patch sadly the game still crashes after docking a ship with 2 docking ports at the same time .
a wetransfer link 150 m before the docking that makes my game crash    https://we.tl/t-Fl41u8rEhK
